allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix Railway deployment: serve React frontend from Flask

- Add nixpacks.toml to build frontend during deployment
- Configure Flask to serve static files from dashboard/dist
- Add catch-all route for React Router client-side routing
- Update .railwayignore to deploy built frontend
- Configure Vite for production API URLs

Fixes 404 errors by ensuring frontend is built and served correctly.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix nixpacks build: use python -m pip instead of pip

Nixpacks virtual environment doesn''t have pip in PATH by default.
Use python -m pip to install requirements and move frontend build
to build phase for proper sequencing.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
